trans-unit.source: Specifies the values that resolve a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.
trans-unit.target: Anger det värde som matchar en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> till en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> med PNRP Namespace providern API-protokollet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> which contains all the information for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> that was published in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>som innehåller all information för den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>som publicerats i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>eller moln som frågades under Lös.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny standardinstansen av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: After successfully resolving a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> contains all the information for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: När du har löst har en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>innehåller all information för den angivna <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>som publicerats i moln som frågades under den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>åtgärden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution data after the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar peer-upplösning data efter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> händelsen inträffar.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden är ett asynkront motanrop som används för att bearbeta peer name resolution data när peer-lösning har slutförts.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event is raised by the peer resolver object.
trans-unit.target: Härledda typer kan åsidosätta den här metoden för att utföra ytterligare aktiviteter när den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelse utlöses av peer-matchare objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the data returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som innehåller data som returneras av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution progress data when the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar peer-matchning pågår data när den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> händelsen inträffar.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden är ett asynkront motanrop som används för att bearbeta peer-upplösning data efter peer-matchning pågår har begärts.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Härledda typer kan åsidosätta den här metoden för att utföra ytterligare aktiviteter när den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref>objekt som innehåller peer förloppet information om namnmatchning som returneras av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Matchar den angivna <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> i alla moln känt att anropa peer-datorn.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden associerar ett peer-namn till moln.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Alla moln tillfrågas för <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om peer-namn kan inte matchas eller `null`, en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>metoden liknar <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod för varje peer-namnpost i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Observera att använda metoden Lös på en enskild peer-namnpost inte ogiltigförklara matcha flera peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parametern anges, metoden använder den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>genvägen att fylla i molnet parametrar.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"> </xref> som innehåller alla poster för peer-namn (visas i form av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objekt) som är associerade med det angivna namnet.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> kan registreras av olika användare i samma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>, och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Peer-namnet som angetts kan inte lösas.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matchar det angivna Peer-namnet i alla moln känt att anropa peer returnerar mer än det angivna antalet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden associerar ett peer-namn till moln.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Alla moln tillfrågas för peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma peer-namn kan registreras av olika användare i samma <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>inte kan lösas (till exempel peer-namn har inte publicerats) en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects to obtain from all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> objects for the supplied `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala antalet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objekt som ska hämta från alla <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> objekt för den angivna `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: En vars storlek är mindre än eller lika med maxRecords poster.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Den här samlingen innehåller peer name poster som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> som löstes.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den maxRecords parametern är mindre än eller lika med noll.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Det angivna namnet kan inte matchas.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matchar den angivna <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>i angiven <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>inte kan lösas (d.v.s. peer-namn har inte publicerats) en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parametern är `null`, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>använder den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>genvägen att fylla i de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, och <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> som ska matcha peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref>som innehåller alla poster för peer-namn (visas i form av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objekt) som är associerade med det angivna namnet.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> kan registreras av olika användare i samma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>, och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Det angivna namnet kan inte matchas.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matchar den angivna <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>i angiven <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>, returnerar mer än det angivna antalet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objekt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om peer-namn måste matcha en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parametern är `null`, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>använder den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>genvägen att fylla i de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, och <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> som ska matcha den `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of peer name record objects to obtain from the specified cloud for the specified `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala antalet poster peer name-objekt att hämta från den angivna molnet för den angivna `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: En vars storlek är mindre än eller lika med maxRecords poster.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Den här samlingen innehåller peer name poster som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> som löstes.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den maxRecords parametern är mindre än eller lika med noll.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Det angivna namnet kan inte matchas.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Börjar en asynkron peer name resolution åtgärd för den angivna <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>i alla moln känt att anropa peer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden associerar asynkront ett peer-namn till moln.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Alla moln tillfrågas för <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: It raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eller den genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om peer-namn måste matcha en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>metoden liknar <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod för varje peer-namnpost i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Observera att använda metoden Lös på en enskild peer-namnpost inte ogiltigförklara matcha flera peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering och Lös-metoden är avsedd för synkron bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Alla asynkrona referenser till objektet matcharen samordnas med en unik identifierare token.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Detta `userState` token eller meddelande-ID tillåter ett operativsystem att leverera ett meddelande till en enda inleveransprocessen när meddelandet har placerats i meddelandekön.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains state information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: En användardefinierad objekt som innehåller statusinformation om peer name resolution igen.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: En eller båda av de peerName och userState parametrar ställs in till .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than maxRecords entries for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Börjar en asynkron peer name resolution åtgärd för den angivna i alla moln känt att anropa peer, returnerar inga fler än maxRecords poster för peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden associerar asynkront ett peer-namn till moln.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Alla moln tillfrågas för <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om peer-namn kan inte matchas eller `null`, en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>genereras.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eller den genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering och Lös-metoden är avsedd för synkron bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Alla asynkrona referenser till objektet matcharen samordnas med en unik identifierare token <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Detta `userState` token eller meddelande-ID tillåter ett operativsystem att leverera ett meddelande till en enda inleveransprocessen när meddelandet har placerats i meddelandekön.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain for the Peer Name.
trans-unit.target: Maximalt antal poster som ska hämtas för peer-namn.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: Ett användardefinierat objekt som innehåller information om Lös igen.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: En eller båda av de peerName och userState parametrar ställs in till .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den maxRecords parametern är mindre än eller lika med noll.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Börjar en asynkron peer name resolution åtgärd för den angivna <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> i angiven <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eller den genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parametern är `null`, namnet matchas med hjälp av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>genväg som initierar standardvärden för de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, och <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering och Lös-metoden är avsedd för synkron bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Alla asynkrona referenser till objektet matcharen samordnas med en unik identifierare token.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Detta `userState` token eller meddelande-ID tillåter ett operativsystem att leverera ett meddelande till en enda inleveransprocessen när meddelandet har placerats i meddelandekön.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> som ska matcha den `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: En användardefinierad <xref:System.Object>som innehåller information om peer name resolution åtgärd.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: En eller båda av de peerName och userState parametrar ställs in till .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Börjar en asynkron peer name resolution åtgärd för den angivna <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> i angiven <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resolution operation will resolve no more than maxRecords entries for the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärden upplösning matchar ingen mer än maxRecords poster för det angivna namnet.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: För oskyddat peer-namn, samma namn kan vara registrerad (och som är associerade med olika slutpunkter) av olika peer-datorer inom samma moln.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eller den genererar den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse anropar tillbaka till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parametern är `null`, namnet matchas med hjälp av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>genväg som initierar standardvärden för de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, och <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>metod, det finns en motsvarande <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>metod.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Sina listor över parametrar är identiska, förutom att metoden ResolveAsync innehåller en systemtoken för asynkron händelsehantering och Lös-metoden är avsedd för synkron bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Alla asynkrona referenser till objektet peer-matchare samordnas med en unik identifierare token <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Detta `userState` token eller meddelande-ID tillåter ett operativsystem att leverera ett meddelande till en enda inleveransprocessen när meddelandet har placerats i meddelandekön.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen aktiveras om resolve-åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The `peerName` to resolve.
trans-unit.target: Den `peerName` att lösa.

trans-unit.source: The `cloud` in which to resolve `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Den `cloud` att lösa `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain from `cloud` for `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala antalet poster som ska hämta från `cloud` för `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Ett användardefinierat objekt som innehåller information om peer name resolution igen.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: En eller båda av de peerName och userState parametrar ställs in till .

trans-unit.source: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: En eller flera av de angivna parametrarna är ogiltiga.

trans-unit.source: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
trans-unit.target: Slutförande av den här åtgärden kräver minst en händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den maxRecords parametern är mindre än eller lika med noll.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter den angivna asynkrona peer begäranden om namnmatchning.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Anropar den här metoden garanterar systemet inte försöker att hämta ytterligare poster för den angivna <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP).
trans-unit.target: Om den här metoden anropas när en asynkron peer name resolution åtgärd inte är utestående, det fungerar som "ingen åtgärd" (Nej OP).

trans-unit.source: The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress.
trans-unit.target: Den `userState` objekt måste anges eftersom den används för att spåra en specifik asynkront anrop när flera anrop pågår.

trans-unit.source: This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Objektet anropsangiven är unikt för varje peer name resolution begäran.

trans-unit.source: This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden returnerar omedelbart, men det kanske eller kanske inte omedelbart.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred.
trans-unit.target: Händelseargument som returneras av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>händelsen innehåller ett fält som kan användas av klienter för att fastställa om annullering inträffade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Anropar den här metoden garanterar händelsen ResolveCompleted signaleras så snart som möjligt med händelseargumentet <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>inställd på `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object provided to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> method instance which started the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: Det angivna objektet till den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>metodinstans som är igång igen Lös.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The userState parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: Den userState parametrar kan inte vara .

trans-unit.source: The ResolveCompleted event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen ResolveCompleted signaleras när en peer-begäran om namnmatchning för en viss <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>har slutförts.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>händelse aktiveras en gång för varje slutpunkt som hittas och den här händelsen aktiveras endast när när alla slutpunkter har hittats.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event will also be raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den här händelsen aktiveras också om de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>åtgärden har slutförts med fel eller har avbrutits.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: This event is signaled whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> object is found in response to a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> operation for a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den här händelsen signaleras när en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objektet hittades i svaret på en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>åtgärd för en specifik <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> found.
trans-unit.target: Om flera <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objekt finns i moln som frågas, den här händelsen signaleras en gång för varje <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>hittades.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
